articles.title: Airbus-built European robotic arm ready for space - Asian Aviation
articles.description: Airbus space engineers have installed ESA’s European Robotic Arm (ERA) on to the Russian Multipurpose Laboratory Module (MLM) and it is now ready for its flight to the International Space Station (ISS).
